mapper.select: select * from sys_user where username = #{username} and del_flag = '0'

select * from sys_user where del_flag = '0' and id in (select user_id from sys_user_org where org_id=#{orgId})
and username = #{username}

select * from sys_user where del_flag = '0' and id in (select user_id from sys_user_role where role_id=#{roleId})
and username = #{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET org_code = #{orgCode} where username = #{username}
mapper.select: select * from sys_user where phone = #{phone} and del_flag = '0'
select * from sys_user where email = #{email} and del_flag = '0'
mapper.sql:
FROM sys_org -- 关联查询出该部门有哪些用户 INNER JOIN sys_user_org ON sys_user_org.org_id = sys_org.id -- 关联查询出该用户的详细信息 INNER JOIN sys_user ON sys_user.id = sys_user_org.user_id WHERE sys_org.org_code LIKE '${orgCode}%'
AND sys_user.realname LIKE '%${userParams.realname}%'
AND sys_user.work_no LIKE '%${userParams.workNo}%'
mapper.select:
SELECT sys_user.id AS "sys_user.id", sys_user.realname AS "sys_user.realname", sys_user.work_no AS "sys_user.work_no", sys_user.post AS "sys_user.post", sys_user.telephone AS "sys_user.telephone", sys_user.email AS "sys_user.email", sys_user.phone AS "sys_user.phone", sys_org.id AS "sys_org.id", sys_org.org_name AS "sys_org.org_name"
ORDER BY sys_org.org_code ASC
